Posts.Content: Hi If you are in a union contact them to support you  Phone the Macmillan line they will help you  You are being treated unfairly  People with cancer even if cured are disabled and as such have protected rights  They are discriminating against you because you are disabled which is illegal  Keep a diary  If you want to stay there you need to raise a grievance with hr detailing all the   Points , if the grievance isn't dealt with you can take them to a tribunal for disability discrimination  After all you've been through is it worth staying there ? I wouldn't  Aim to get a payout of them and move on  Good luck xx

Posts.Content: HI Girls My first appointment is Thursday .Please can you tell me what the R1 and R2 creams are please  ? I was at the dentist today and he gave me a prescription for special toothpaste that puts a coating on your teeth and prevents decay cosd by the radiotherapy - he said also causes your mouth to be dry with less saliva Good luck everyone Arlene xx

Posts.Content: HI Julie , I went back 2 weeks after my operation - it was a big mistake - i was so tired and it was expected that i worked 6.5 days then 5 days ...I got to the 9th day and had a bit of a breakdown ..could not stop crying .I am now off sick and getting RT - I am so glad as I planned to work - but there is absolutely no way I could have done that .My advice - do not go back too early and dont work during RT ....good luck xxxx
